name: TG File Share/Sharing Bot
description: file sharing bot store posts and it can access by special links

TG_BOT_TOKEN.description: Your Bot token, Get it from @Botfather

OWNER_ID.description: An integer of consisting of your owner ID

APP_ID.description: your app id, take it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: your api hash, take it from my.telegram.org

CHANNEL_ID.description: make a channel (database channel), then make the bot as admin in channel, and it's id

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL_1.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL_2.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL_3.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

FORCE_SUB_CHANNEL_4.description: id of the channel or group, if you want enable force sub feature else put 0

START_MESSAGE.description: Optional: start message of bot, use HTML parsemode format

FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.description: Optional: Force Sub message of bot, use HTML parsemode format
FORCE_SUB_MESSAGE.value: 𝑯𝒆𝒚!! {mention} 𝒘𝒆𝒍𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒆 𝒕𝒐 @Anime_Eternals 𝒄𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒏𝒆𝒍𝒔 𝑻𝒐 𝒂𝒄𝒄𝒆𝒔𝒔 𝒕𝒉𝒆𝒔𝒆 𝒇𝒊𝒍𝒆𝒔 𝒚𝒐𝒖 𝒉𝒂𝒗𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝒋𝒐𝒊𝒏 𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒄𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒏𝒆𝒍 𝒇𝒊𝒓𝒔𝒕. 𝑷𝒍𝒆𝒂𝒔𝒆 𝒔𝒖𝒃𝒔𝒄𝒓𝒊𝒃𝒆 𝒕𝒐 𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒄𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒏𝒆𝒍𝒔 𝒕𝒉𝒓𝒐𝒖𝒈𝒉 𝒕𝒉𝒆 𝒃𝒖𝒕𝒕𝒐𝒏𝒔 𝒃𝒆𝒍𝒐𝒘 𝒂𝒏𝒅 𝒕𝒉𝒆𝒏 𝒕𝒂𝒑 𝒐𝒏 𝒕𝒓𝒚 𝒂𝒈𝒂𝒊𝒏 𝒕𝒐 𝒈𝒆𝒕 𝒚𝒐𝒖𝒓 𝒇𝒊𝒍𝒆𝒔 𝑭𝒐𝒓 𝑶𝒏𝒈𝒐𝒊𝒏𝒈 𝑨𝒏𝒊𝒎𝒆 @Anime_Ongoing_Airings 𝑱𝒐𝒊𝒏 𝑻𝒉𝒊𝒔 𝑪𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒏𝒆𝒍 𝑻𝒉𝒂𝒏𝒌 𝒀𝒐𝒖.......🍁 » @AnimeNexusNetwork
